file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-40-02-04 - LAVATORY DOOR LOCK - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LAVATORY DOOR LOCK - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the lavatory door lock. B. The lavatory door lock is installed in the passenger cabin, at zones 261 and 262. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 25-40-02-000-801-A LAVATORY DOOR LOCK - REMOVAL ALL 25-40-02-400-801-A LAVATORY DOOR LOCK - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-40-02 Page 1 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-40-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LAVATORY DOOR LOCK - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the lavatory door lock. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-44-01-000-801-A/400 LAVATORY SLIDE DOOR - REMOVAL AMM TASK 25-44-01-000-802-A/400 LAVATORY BI-FOLD DOOR - REMOVAL S.B.145-25-0315 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin/lavatory I. Lavatory Door Lock with Slide Door - Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) On aircraft with slide door, remove the lavatory door lock, as follows: (a) Remove the slide door (1) AMM TASK 25-44-01-000-801-A/400. (b) Remove the screws (8) that attach the escutcheon plate (7). Refer to DET. C,Figure 401, sheet 2. (c) Remove the escutcheon plate (7). (d) Put the indicator latch (16) in the locked position and loosen the rod (6). Refer to DET. C and DET. F, Figure 401, sheet 2. (e) Pull the rod (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-40-02 Page 2 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (f) Remove the screws (5) that attach the lavatory sign assembly (4) to the slide door (1). Refer to DET. B, Figure 401, sheet 1. (g) Remove the knob (2) and the external knob (3). (h) Remove the screws (14) that attach the indicator latch (16). Refer to DET. E, Figure 401, sheet 2. (i) Remove the indicator latch (16). (j) If it is necessary to remove the door latch (9), remove the screws (10) and (11) that attach the door latch (9). Refer to DET. D, Figure 401, sheet 2. J. Lavatory Door Lock with Bi-Fold Door - Removal (Figure 402) (Figure 403) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-25-0315, remove the lavatory door lock, as follows (Figure 402): (a) Remove the bi-fold door (1) AMM TASK 25-44-01-000-802-A/400. (b) Remove the screws (10) that attach the escutcheon plate (8). Refer to DET. C,Figure 402, sheet 2. (c) Remove the escutcheon plate (8). (d) Put the indicator latch (13) in the locked position and loosen the rod (9). (e) Pull the rod (9). (f) Remove the screws (6) that attach the lavatory sign assembly (5) to the bi-fold door (1). (g) Remove the knob (7) and the external knob (4). (h) Remove the screws (14) that attach the indicator latch (13). Refer to DET. D, Figure 402, sheet 2. (i) Remove the indicator latch (13). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-25-0315, remove the lavatory door lock, as follows (Figure 403): (a) Remove the bi-fold door (1) AMM TASK 25-44-01-000-802-A/400. (b) Remove the screws (6) that attach the lavatory sign assembly (5) to the bi-fold door (1). Refer to DET. B, Figure 403, sheet 2. (c) Remove the knob (7) and the external knob (4). (d) Remove the screws (9) that attach the magnetic striker plate (8) to the block support. Refer to DET. C, Figure 403, sheet 2. (e) Remove the screws (10) that attach the indicator latch (12). Refer to DET. C, Figure 403, sheet 2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-40-02 Page 3 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (f) Remove the indicator latch (12). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-40-02 Page 4 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-40-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. LAVATORY DOOR LOCK - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the lavatory door lock. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-40-02-700-801-A/500 LAVATORY DOOR INDICATOR LATCH - TEST AMM TASK 25-40-03-100-801-A/700 LAVATORY DOOR PARTS - CLEANING AMM TASK 25-44-01-400-801-A/400 LAVATORY SLIDE DOOR - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 25-44-01-400-802-A/400 LAVATORY BI-FOLD DOOR - INSTALLATION S.B.145-25-0315 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) ASTM D 5363 Loctite 242 AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin/lavatory I. Lavatory Door Lock with Slide Door - Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Clean the rod. Refer to AMM TASK 25-40-03-100-801-A/700 (2) Clean the escutcheon plate. Refer to AMM TASK 25-40-03-100-801-A/700. (3) On aircraft with slide door, install the lavatory door lock, as follows: (a) If you removed the door latch (9), install it again with the screws (10) and (11). Refer to DET. D, (Figure 401), sheet 2. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-40-02 Page 11 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (b) Do the Lavatory Door Lock - Adjustment/Test (AMM TASK 25-40-02-700-801-A/ 500). (c) Install the indicator latch (16) with the screws (14). (d) Install the knob (2) and the external knob (3). NOTE: Apply Loctite 242 to the threads of the knobs. Refer to (Figure 401), sheet 1. (e) Put the indicator latch (16) in the locked position and install the rod (6). (f) Install the escutcheon plate (7) with the screws (8). Refer to DET. C,(Figure 401), sheet 2. NOTE: If the indicator latch (16) becomes much harder to operate after the installation of the rod (6) and the escutcheon plate (7), remove the screws (8) and the escutcheon plate (7) and move the rod (6) a 1/4 turn. Install the escutcheon plate (7) back with the screws (8). (g) Install the lavatory sign assembly (4) with the screws (5). (h) Install the slide door (1) AMM TASK 25-44-01-400-801-A/400. J. Lavatory Door Lock with Bi-Fold Door - Installation (Figure 402) (Figure 403) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) On aircraft with bi-fold door PRE-MOD. S.B.145-25-0315, install the lavatory door lock, as follows (Figure 402): (a) Clean the rod. Refer to AMM TASK 25-40-03-100-801-A/700 (b) Clean the escutcheon plate. Refer to AMM TASK 25-40-03-100-801-A/700. (c) Do the Lavatory Door Lock - Adjustment/Test. (AMM TASK 25-40-02-700-801-A/ 500). (d) Install the indicator latch (13) with the screws (14). (e) Install the knob (7) and the external knob (4). NOTE: Apply Loctite 242 to the threads of the knobs. Refer to (Figure 402), sheet 2. (f) Put the indicator latch (13) in the locked position and install the rod (9). (g) Install the escutcheon plate (8) with the screws (10). Refer to DET. C,(Figure 402), sheet 2. NOTE: If the indicator latch (13) becomes much harder to operate after the installation of the rod (9) and the escutcheon plate (8), remove the screws (10) and the escutcheon plate (8) and move the rod (9) a 1/4 turn. Install the escutcheon plate (8) back with the screws (10). (h) Install the lavatory sign assembly (5) with the screws (6). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-40-02 Page 12 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (i) Install the bi-fold door (1) AMM TASK 25-44-01-400-802-A/400. (2) On aircraft with bi-fold door POST-MOD. S.B.145-25-0315, install the lavatory door lock, as follows (Figure 403): (a) Install the indicator latch (12) with the screws (10). Refer to DET. C,(Figure 403), sheet 2. (b) Install the the magnetic striker plate (8) with the screws (9). Refer to DET. C, (Figure 403), sheet 2. (c) Install the knob (7) and the external knob (4). NOTE: Apply Loctite 242 to the threads of the knobs. Refer to DET. B, (Figure 403), sheet 2. (d) Install the lavatory sign assembly (5) with the screws (6). (e) Install the bi-fold door (1) AMM TASK 25-44-01-400-802-A/400. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-40-02 Page 13 of 13 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
